words.def: the act of determining the properties of something, usually by research or calculation
Present participle of fine.
A derogatory term, a vile wretch, used in Heathenry.
Unworthy, undeserving.
the act of eating dinner
a productive insight
a ringing sound
a central point or locus of an infection in an organism
difference.

A pointed tool without any sharp edges, used in weaving or knotwork to tighten and form up weaves or complex knots; used in sailing ships to open the strands of a rope before splicing. Compare marlinespike.
a diagram or picture illustrating textual material
the cardinal number that is the sum of four and one
A disease of sheep caused by tapeworm.
the site of an archeological exploration
strong liquor flavored with juniper berries
a loud harsh or strident noise
a hotel providing overnight lodging for travelers
An uncertainty, possibility, condition, doubt etc.
County/City (Proper noun)
a state in the Rocky Mountains
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
